description.displayText: I recommend Stacey without reservation. I have known Stacey for 10 years, and have found her to be a truly remarkable person. She is organized, efficient, and industrious. Stacey has energy and enthusiasm in everything she does, she is a real go getter. She also has a sweet and feminine side, she is the best possible mom, and a loyal friend. When riled she can be a fierce fighter for justice and she is very protective of those in her care. Any employer would be fortunate to have her!
description.originalText: I recommend Stacey without reservation. I have known Stacey for 10 years, and have found her to be a truly remarkable person. She is organized, efficient, and industrious. Stacey has energy and enthusiasm in everything she does, she is a real go getter. She also has a sweet and feminine side, she is the best possible mom, and a loyal friend. When riled she can be a fierce fighter for justice and she is very protective of those in her care. Any employer would be fortunate to have her!

description.displayText: Stacey is a family member who has been an amazing mother to three children. Her even temperament, thoughtfulness and dependability have been a wonderful "ground floor" for her and the neighborhood children.
description.originalText: Stacey is a family member who has been an amazing mother to three children. Her even temperament, thoughtfulness and dependability have been a wonderful "ground floor" for her and the neighborhood children.

description.displayText: Stacy has qualities that can't be taught in a classroom. Stacy is kind by nature. I could tell by the way my daughters face lit up, that she truly liked her. Stacy's gentle voice and manner were a great comfort to my child while I was at work all day. Stacy had good common sense.  I never worried about my daughter's safety when she was with Stacy.  Stacy never let my child sit a wet diaper. There was never a cases of diaper rash. Stacy was flexible when my job was not. Stacy's home was very clean and neat. Stacy treated my daughter like she was a member of her family. We worried no one would our daughter while we were at work, but Stacy said she would hold our girl more than she did her own child. I think she did. Hire Stacy.  I KNEW WHEN I MET HER SHE WOULD BE THE BEST SITTER I COULD GET, AND SHE WAS!!!!
